posts.post_content:
I will take everything related to Dummy Taylor.

Let me know-

Best,
Danny
BTW This is all other tobaccos (I reported it to be moved for you). I know I have at least 2 Taylors in old mill back and 1 in Piedmont. They will be at the national /w me.

I've got a dupe that's appx. VG/EX+ (raw).  It has a clean SC 350 back.

I would consider selling or trading for more difficult backs ... Feel free to send me an email with an offer if interested.

Best,
Scott
